news.title: Salesforce Bolsters Automation with Regrello Acquisition
news.body: Salesforce is set to acquire Regrello, enhancing its agentic process automation capabilities. By integrating Regrello's technology, which transforms business data into automated workflows, Salesforce aims to streamline operations and boost efficiency for its users. This strategic move is pivotal for Salesforce customers seeking more robust automation solutions.

news.title: Circle Steps Up Blockchain Game with Malachite Acquisition
news.body: Circle Internet Group has acquired Malachite from Informal Systems, bolstering its blockchain capabilities to support the new Arc network, tailored for stablecoin finance. This acquisition underscores Circle's commitment to expanding its blockchain infrastructure, positioning it as a leader in the stablecoin arena.

news.title: Thailand Tests Crypto-to-Baht Conversion for Tourists
news.body: Thailand is piloting a program allowing tourists to convert cryptocurrencies to baht, aiming to attract crypto-savvy travelers and simplify financial transactions. This initiative could significantly enhance the tourist experience and boost the local economy by integrating modern payment technologies.

news.title: Visa Expands Click to Pay in Asia Pacific, Enhancing Checkout
news.body: Visa is expanding its Click to Pay service across the Asia Pacific, partnering with major payment processors to streamline online checkouts. This expansion is crucial for providing a faster, more secure payment experience, meeting the rising consumer demand for efficient digital payment solutions in diverse markets.

news.title: Citi Ventures into Stablecoin Payment Services
news.body: Citigroup is exploring the potential to offer custody and payment services for stablecoins, following new U.S. legislation. This move could mark a significant shift in traditional banking, integrating cryptocurrency solutions to meet evolving financial needs and regulatory landscapes.
